elements.label: Mottling
elements.description: My creation is dotted with speckles of colour, like the pinpricks of Glory-light that pierce the secrets of the Wood, or the markings on the wings that beat within.

elements.label: Gilding
elements.description: No mortal eye shall turn away from my masterpiece as it awakens their hungers.

elements.label: Holding
elements.description: Bark wears down with time, and magic does not remain trapped for long. Blood will stay the hands of age.

elements.label: A Mellifying Tribute
elements.comments: Unique tracking aspect so we can check for the statue's presence via extantreqs
Uniqueness Group aspect for the statues
